mapper.insert: insert into repairorder (rid, cusid, empno, emp_empno, dnid, rbegintime, rtype, rendtime, rnumber, rmoney, tuikauntype) values (#{rid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cusid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{empno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{empEmpno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dnid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rbegintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tuikauntype,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update repairorder set cusid = #{cusid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, empno = #{empno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, emp_empno = #{empEmpno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dnid = #{dnid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rbegintime = #{rbegintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rtype = #{rtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rendtime = #{rendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rnumber = #{rnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rmoney = #{rmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, tuikauntype = #{tuikauntype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where rid = #{rid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select rid, cusid, empno, emp_empno, dnid, rbegintime, rtype, rendtime, rnumber, rmoney, tuikauntype from repairorder where rid = #{rid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select rid, cusid, empno, emp_empno, dnid, rbegintime, rtype, rendtime, rnumber, rmoney, tuikauntype from repairorder
